one of the ways we've prevented attacks and saved lives is by monitoring terrorist-related communications last year congress passed major revisions to the foreign intelligence surveillance law the fisa but those revisions have now expired and so we've lost an important means for protecting the american people for congress to let that happen was simply irresponsible and it makes the nation more vulnerable to attack
